title: Cindy Crawford and Kaia Gerber coordinate in leather jackets and jeans during day out in NYC
text:
They share great genes, incredible careers and a keen eye for fashion.

And on Sunday, Cindy Crawford and daughter Kaia Gerber coordinated in leather jackets and jeans while out in New York City.

The 53-year-old has been in The Big Apple since earlier this week, but looked to be leaving the city as she was later seen toting her luggage.

Twinning: On Sunday, Cindy Crawford, 53, and daughter Kaia Gerber, 18, coordinated in leather jackets and jeans while out in New York City

Cindy tucked in a cream sweater into a pair of cropped denim.

The mother-of-two continued to dress down her stylish look with white sneakers and accessorized with earrings and a simple pendant necklace.

Kaia, 18, layered a cropped black sweater over a white top and underneath a long, leather jacket.

Like her mother, Kaia added white sneakers and accessorized with shades, earrings and topped off her look with a baseball hat.

Stylish: Cindy tucked in a cream sweater into a pair of cropped denim

The simple things: The mother-of-two continued to dress down her stylish look with white sneakers and accessorized with earrings and a simple pendant necklace

The supermodel took to Instagram to share a stunning shot from her trip back east to the Big Apple.

Cindy was surely in her element as she posed against a graffiti backdrop while touring the city.

She sported a downtown city vibe, layering a patterned top underneath a trendy blazer, and completing her look with jeans, leather boots and a Gucci belt.

'NY,' she wrote, alongside a heart emoji.

'NY': The supermodel took to Instagram to share a stunning shot from her trip there

Different strokes: Kaia's take was a '90s vibe, while Cindy' sported a more modern version

Cindy was one of the most famous models in the early '90s, alongside Kate Moss and Linda Evangelista, among others.

Kaia has since taken on her mother's career, and is grateful for her influence. While speaking at Vogue's Forces of Fashion panel, the teen acknowledge the guidance she's received.

'If anyone had a point of reference, I definitely did, and one of the best ones, she began, according to Allure.

'[It wasn't] a foreign world to go into. I felt like I understood it. I knew what I was kind of getting into. I’d been around it a lot. I definitely think there are some things that, no matter how much somebody can tell you about, there were a lot of things you do have to learn firsthand.'

She also said that she has 'so much appreciation for women like my mom and for the other girls who come who don’t know anything.'
